title: China urges U.S. to withdraw meeting restrictions imposed against Chinese diplomats
text:
China urges U.S. to withdraw meeting restrictions imposed against Chinese diplomats

Economy 19 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 03:49AM ET)

BEIJING (Reuters) - China's Foreign Ministry said on Thursday that it urges the United States to withdraw new meeting restrictions imposed against Chinese diplomats. Chinese diplomats in the United States are now required to give advanced notice of any plans to meet with U.S. state, local and municipal officials, senior State Department officials said on Wednesday.

China urges U.S. to withdraw meeting restrictions imposed against Chinese diplomats
description: China urges U.S. to withdraw meeting restrictions imposed against Chinese diplomats
